original_text: But I will send a fire upon Moab, and it shall devour the palaces of Kirioth: and Moab shall die with tumult, with shouting, and with the sound of the trumpet:
korean_text: 내가 모압에 불을 보내리니 그리욧 궁궐들을 사르리라 모압이 요란함과 외침과 나팔 소리 중에서 죽을 것이라

sentences.original_text: But I will send a fire upon Moab
and it shall devour the palaces of Kirioth
and Moab shall die with tumult
and with the sound of the trumpet
